wordGroup: dress and personal adornment 服饰

sentences.en: To twentieth-century eyes, Chinese pottery may appear merely decorative, yet to the Chinese the form of each object and its adornment had meaning and significance.
sentences.cn: 在二十世纪的人看来，中国的陶器可能只是装饰品，但对中国人来说，每件物品的形状和装饰都有意义，都很重要。

sentences.en: A plain necklace was her only adornment.
sentences.cn: 她身上的饰物就只有一串简单的项链。
